sentences.sContent: Our personal freedom is being gradually eroded away.
sentences.sCn: 我们的个人自由正逐渐受到限制。

sentences.sContent: Repeated exam failure had eroded her confidence.
sentences.sCn: 考试屡屡不及格削弱了她的自信心。

remMethod.val: e + rode(咬) → 咬掉 → 侵蚀

words.tran: 啮蚀状的；凹凸不平的；不规则形状的
腐蚀的；冲蚀的；侵蚀性的
侵蚀；损坏（erode的过去分词形式）

trans.tranCn: 侵蚀；  削弱， 损害
trans.tranOther: to gradually reduce something such as someone’s power or confidence
